title: Piracy - actual and attempted attacks worldwide by country 2019
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Number of incidents in the y axis.
The Number of incidents is highest at Country Nigeria and lowest at Country Venezuela.
The Number of incidents of Country Nigeria is 5.83% larger than the minimum value at Venezuela.
